trans-unit.source: Installing Signavio Process Manager on a Tomcat cluster (optional)

seg-source.mrk: Installing Signavio Process Manager on a Tomcat cluster (optional)

trans-unit.source: You can deploy Signavio Process Manager on an Apache Tomcat cluster, with all nodes using the same database.

seg-source.mrk: You can deploy Signavio Process Manager on an Apache Tomcat cluster, with all nodes using the same database.

target.mrk: Der Signavio Process Manager kann in einem Apache Tomcat Cluster betrieben werden, wobei alle Knoten des Clusters dieselbe Datenbank verwenden.

trans-unit.source: Using a Tomcat cluster improves the performance (scale on high load) and availability of your system.

seg-source.mrk: Using a Tomcat cluster improves the performance (scale on high load) and availability of your system.

target.mrk: Der Betrieb im Cluster kann die Performanz (Skalierbarkeit bei hoher Last) und Verfügbarkeit des Systems erhöhen.

trans-unit.source: However, we recommend you to not deploy Signavio Process Manager in a cluster, to avoid unnecessary administrative overhead.

seg-source.mrk: However, we recommend you to not deploy Signavio Process Manager in a cluster, to avoid unnecessary administrative overhead.

target.mrk: Auf Grund des höheren administrativen Mehraufwands empfehlen wir jedoch, den Signavio Process Manager nicht in einem Cluster zu betreiben.

trans-unit.source: A system instance that runs on one Tomcat scales well even with more than 1000 modeling users, as long as you increase the memory assigned to the Tomcat (for example to 16GB).

seg-source.mrk: A system instance that runs on one Tomcat scales well even with more than 1000 modeling users, as long as you increase the memory assigned to the Tomcat (for example to 16GB).

target.mrk: Lediglich der dem Tomcat zugewiesene Arbeitsspeicher sollte bei einer hohen Anzahl von Nutzern erhöht werden (zum Beispiel auf 16 GB).

trans-unit.source: To increase the availability, install a passive web server or to install the web server as a virtual machine on a high-available infrastructure. This increases the availability on server level and not on application level. Furthermore, you can monitor the Tomcat server so that it can quickly be restarted - automatically or manually - if performance issues occur.

seg-source.mrk: To increase the availability, install a passive web server or to install the web server as a virtual machine on a high-available infrastructure.
This increases the availability on server level and not on application level.
Furthermore, you can monitor the Tomcat server so that it can quickly be restarted - automatically or manually - if performance issues occur.

target.mrk: Um die Ausfallsicherheit zu erhöhen, empfehlen wir, einen passiven Webserver bereitzuhalten oder den Webserver als virtuelle Maschine in einer ausfallsicheren Infrastruktur zu betreiben.
Dadurch wird die Ausfallsicherheit auf Serverebene und nicht auf Anwendungsebene erhöht.
Außerdem empfehlen wir ein Monitoring für den Tomcat Server einzurichten, sodass der Tomcat Server im Falle eines Ausfalls entweder automatisch oder zeitnah manuell neugestartet wird.

trans-unit.source: If you want to deploy Signavio Process Manager on a Tomcat cluster, please consider the following:

seg-source.mrk: If you want to deploy Signavio Process Manager on a Tomcat cluster, please consider the following:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie den Signavio Process Manager in einem Tomcat Cluster betreiben möchten, beachten Sie bitte die folgenden Punkte:

trans-unit.source: You need an additional Signavio license for each Signavio server.

seg-source.mrk: You need an additional Signavio license for each Signavio server.

target.mrk: Für jeden Signavio Server wird eine separate Signavio Lizenz benötigt.

trans-unit.source: Ensure each Tomcat instance uses a unique JVM-Route. Edit the Tomcat configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR\conf\server.xml</kbd> and add the attribute jvmRoute to the XML Element Engine, for example:

seg-source.mrk: Ensure each Tomcat instance uses a unique JVM-Route.
Edit the Tomcat configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR\conf\server.xml</kbd> and add the attribute jvmRoute to the XML Element Engine, for example:

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass in jeder Tomcat-Instanz eine eindeutige JVM-Route gesetzt ist.

seg-source.mrk: Use a tomcat session cluster.

trans-unit.source: Configure the load balancer to forward all requests of the same session to the same application server ( sticky sessions ).

seg-source.mrk: Configure the load balancer to forward all requests of the same session to the same application server ( sticky sessions ).

target.mrk: Konfigurieren Sie den vorgeschalteten Loadbalancer so, dass alle Anfragen einer Session an denselben Applikationsserver weitergeleitet werden (sticky sessions).

trans-unit.source: Ensure the mailing server is only deployed on one Tomcat instance (see: 3.17 Configure Apache Solr server (optional)). Otherwise, emails will be send multiple times (once for each Tomcat instance).

seg-source.mrk: Ensure the mailing server is only deployed on one Tomcat instance (see: 3.17 Configure Apache Solr server (optional)).
Otherwise, emails will be send multiple times (once for each Tomcat instance).

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass der Mailing-Server auf nur einer Instanz betrieben wird (siehe: 3.19 Mailing Server konfigurieren (optional)).
Anderenfalls wird jede laufende Instanz des Mailing-Servers Emails versenden.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the Solr server is only deployed on one Tomcat instance (see: 3.17 Configure Apache Solr server (optional)).

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that the Solr server is only deployed on one Tomcat instance (see: 3.17 Configure Apache Solr server (optional)).

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher , dass der Solr Server nur auf einer Instanz betrieben wird (siehe: 3.17 Apache Solr Server konfigurieren (optional)).

trans-unit.source:
For each Tomcat instance, adjust the file configuration.xml located at /conf/ as follows:
  • Add the following line: 
    `<enableMultiplePlatformInstances>true</enableMultiplePlatformInstances>`
  • Set the property enableInternalKeyValueCache to false. If the entry doesn't exist, add the following line before the closing tag: 
    `<enableInternalKeyValueCache>false</enableInternalKeyValueCache>`

seg-source.mrk: For each Tomcat instance, adjust the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml </kbd> located at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><signavio-tomcat>/conf/ </kbd> as follows:

• Add the following line: 
    `<enableMultiplePlatformInstances>true</enableMultiplePlatformInstances>`
<li> Set the property <kbd>enableInternalKeyValueCache </kbd> to <kbd> false</kbd>.

If the entry doesn't exist, add the following line before the closing tag: 
`<enableInternalKeyValueCache>false</enableInternalKeyValueCache>`
